author: Mel

review: I have issues with Hulu Plus on it. It takes a long time to load and freezes frequently where I have to start over from home. Netflix seems to work ok but is not really for someone who likes to watch TV because it's mostly movies. Haven't tried the Amazon Prime yet. The sticks were easy to set up. We bought 2 at the same time. One continues to go haywire and we have to unplug, reboot, and start all over. The other one doesn't have that problem at all. For the price, you get what you pay for. After the initial investment we cut our TV bill from $95.00 to $17.00 a month for both Netflix and Hulu Plus. Worth the value if you don't mind some bugs.
